Key Match Events: Bryce Harper was intentionally walked in a big spot, Alec Bohm hit a game-winning RBI single in the 10th inning, and the Phillies won 5-4
Post-Match Reflections: Alec Bohm is used to teams intentionally walking Phillies slugger Bryce Harper in big spots to get him, but Bohm still managed to come through with a game-winning RBI single in the 10th inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies won 4-0 in the regular season series against the Mets
The game was played at Citizens Bank Park in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania with an attendance of 38,795
Others: The game went into extra innings, with the Phillies ultimately emerging victorious in the 10th inning
